outputs.output_descr: To establish the sustablility of CO2 with methyl format co-blowing technology as a variable replacement to HCFC-22/HCFC-142b technology in XPS Foam Sector and to reduce 12.3 ODP tones of HCFC.

project_descr: Demonstration project for conversion from HCFC-22/HCFC-142b technology to  CO2 with methyl formate co-blowing technology in the manufacture of XPS foam at Feininger (Nanjing) Energy Saving Technology Co. Ltd.
project_title: Demonstration project in XPS foam sector-Feininger
